dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 907 IH: Protecting Community Television Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Eshoo (for herself, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Raskin, Ms. Bonamici, Ms. Norton, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Panetta, Ms. Slotkin, Mr. Auchincloss, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Phillips, Mr. Trone, Ms. McCollum, and Mr. McGovern) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to modify the definition of franchise fee, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Community Television Act.

section.header: Modifying the definition of franchise fee
section.text: Section 622(g)(1) of the Communications Act of 1934 (47 U.S.C. 542(g)(1)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking includes and inserting means; and
by inserting other monetary before assessment.
